titles.title: Political Reform and Gridlock Elimination Act
A bill to reform America's political system and eliminate gridlock that blocks progress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/25/2011--Introduced. Political Reform and Gridlock Elimination Act - Expresses the sense of the Senate that Congress should: (1) pass the DISCLOSE Act to prevent a corporate takeover of our elections and ensure that our democracy is open, transparent, and controlled by the people; and (2) reform Senate rules and procedures to reduce excessive obstruction and delay, while protecting the legitimate rights of individual Senators and the minority.
